amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate additional DOE reporting requirements and restrictions on sound scientific processes to independently verify scientific results.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 8 printed in part A of House Report 114-120 to eliminate additional DOE reporting requirements and restrictions on sound scientific processes to independently verify scientific results.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 236 (Roll no. 254).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Lowenthal.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 236 (Roll no. 254).
